channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- InfoSphere Change Data Capture for z/OS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- InfoSphere Change Data Capture for z/OS

item.title: CVE-2020-4821|2024-08-04T08:14:58.938Z -- ibm -- infosphere%20change%20data%20capture%20for%20z%2Fos
item.description: IBM InfoSphere Data Replication 11.4 and IBM InfoSphere Change Data Capture for z/OS 10.2.1, under certain configurations, could allow a user to bypass authentication mechanisms using an empty password string. IBM X-Force ID: 189834
